biotools.summary: Database of human biological pathways and processes ranging from basic processes of metabolism to complex regulatory pathways. The data is curated by biologists and subsequently peer-reviewed for accuracy and consistency. Cross-references with UniProt, PubMed, Ensembl, Gene Ontology and LocusLink are also provided. It supersedes The Genome Knowledgebase project.

bioschemas.name: Reactome
